long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Challenge your brain and creativity with Happy Glass, the ultimate physics-based puzzle game. Your task is simple yet satisfying: draw lines to guide water into the glass and make it happy! With endless possibilities and increasing difficulty, itâ€™s the perfect game to keep your mind sharp and entertained.

ğŸŒŸ Why Install Happy Glass?
Creative Gameplay: Draw your own solutions for every puzzleâ€”no two attempts are the same.
Brain Training Fun: Sharpen your logic and problem-solving skills.
Charming Visuals: Cute and colorful graphics make the game a joy to play.
Realistic Physics: Enjoy a true-to-life water simulation that adds to the challenge.
Hundreds of Levels: Keep the fun going with new puzzles at every turn!

Play more games on the top-left menu.
